name: Daily Mid-Cap Bollinger-RSI Mean Reversion
description: Long-only mean-reversion strategy for U.S. equities on daily bars. Enters when price closes below the lower 20-day Bollinger Band and RSI(14) < 30, exits at the 20-day SMA or RSI > 50, or via hard 3 % stop-loss / 5 % take-profit. Position size limited so worst-case loss equals 1.5 % of account equity.
